name: Warhammer Underworlds - Shadespire Edition
descr: 关于这款游戏*ALL WARBAND & COSMETIC DLC NOW INCLUDED IN THE MAIN GAME!*Warhammer Underworlds – Shadespire Editionis a digital adaptation of the explosive, high-stakes, turn-based strategy tabletop game fromGames Workshopthat pits mighty warbands from theAge of Sigmaruniverse against one another in an eternal player versus player battle for Glory. Choose a warband, build your decks and carve a path to victory usingdice-and-cardmechanics that offer boundless strategic depth.ASSEMBLE YOUR WARBANDTrapped within the towering spires of theMirrored City of Shadespire, fourteen warbands battle it out for survival - each with unique abilities and a distinct combat style. All of these warbands are now available to play in online matches, bot matches or single-player challenges, having previously been available as DLC!Playable warbands:Steelheart’s Champions - Magore's Fiends - Garrek’s Reavers - The Sepulchral Guard – Spiteclaw’s Swarm – The Farstriders – The Chosen Axes – Ironskull’s Boyz – Thorns of the Briar Queen – Eyes of the Nine – Drepur’s Wraithcreepers – The Storm of Celestus – Stormsire’s Cursebreakers – Mollog’s MobCRAFT YOUR DECKYour success is measured in Glory points - awarded for achieving objectives and vanquishing your foes.Deckbuildingis the strategic heart ofWarhammer Underworlds – Shadespire Edition. Your20-card power deckis filled with clever gambits, powerful upgrades, and cunning spells you’ll need to inflict maximum damage. Your12-card objective deckwill shape your tactical approach to a match, allowing you to score Glory by fulfilling specific conditions.CLAIM THE SPOILS OF SHADESPIREArewarding progressionsystem in both online matches and single-player Challenges allows you to earn cosmetic content including warband skins, deck portraits, and player titles! Only those who have proven themselves in the unforgiving streets of Shadespire will be able to claim these rewards.
